description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.XsNbzaRiIvK18VqG]{Burning Hands}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.bNpKDLxcOG7myBTA]{Charm of Misplaced Wrath}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.3m5hL9K7znSUeMs6]{Illusory Obstacles}
